attributes.action: actually take notice of the petitions on this website instead of employing PR people to write responses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do people really think Gordon Brown takes any notice of the petitions on here? It is just a PR scam. I petition Gordon Brown to stop using spin and listen to the people.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
